title: Rescue Volo
content:
Rescue Volo Type Quest Act 1 Location Goblin Camp Reward Volo joins your camp.

Rescue Volo is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Rescue Volo can be acquired during chapter 1. Completing Rescue Volo will progress the story forward.

Rescue Volo Objectives

Rescue Volo Walkthrough

When you entered the goblin camp, you will see Volo was taken prisoner by the goblins and forced to perform. Volo can be found in Shattered Sanctum, you can use the psionic power the convince the goblin to release him. Or pas
